bropals.lib.simplegame.io

Class AssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.io.AssetManager

  • public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads and keeps track of assets. Contans the SoundEffectLoader and the BufferedImageLoader by default.

    AssetManager loads assets relative to the root of a jar file, a file outside of the jar file, or a URL, depending on which constructor is used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssetManager(java.lang.Class assetClass, boolean addDefaultLoaders)
      Makes an AssetManager whose root is the root of the jar file the given class is in.

      Make an AssetManager for the given root directory.
      AssetManager(java.net.URL url, boolean addDefaultLoaders)
      Make an AssetManager for the given root directory that is a URL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssetManager

        public AssetManager(java.net.URL url,
                    boolean addDefaultLoaders)
        Make an AssetManager for the given root directory that is a URL. This root directory is where all locations will be made relative to.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL location to use when looking for assets.
        addDefaultLoaders - specify whether or not AssetManager should add SoundEffectLoader, BufferedImageLoader, and MusicLoader to itself.

      • AssetManager

        public AssetManager(java.io.File root,
                    boolean addDefaultLoaders)
        Make an AssetManager for the given root directory. This root directory is where all locations will be made relative to.
        Parameters:
        root - the direction to use when looking for assets.
        addDefaultLoaders - specify whether or not AssetManager should add SoundEffectLoader, BufferedImageLoader, and MusicLoader to itself.

      • AssetManager

        public AssetManager(java.lang.Class assetClass,
                    boolean addDefaultLoaders)
        Makes an AssetManager whose root is the root of the jar file the given class is in.
        Parameters:
        assetClass - the class that is in the jar file where the assets are located.
        addDefaultLoaders - specify whether or not AssetManager should add SoundEffectLoader, BufferedImageLoader, and MusicLoader to itself.

        public void loadSoundEffectsInDirectories(java.lang.String loc,
                                          boolean recursive)
        Identical to calling loadAssetsInDirectories(loc, SoundEffect.class, true).
        Parameters:
        loc - the relative location of the directory to load
        recursive - whether or not subdirectories should be loaded
        See Also:

        public <T> T getAsset(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.Class<T> assetType)
        Gets a loaded asset.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the loaded asset
        Parameters:
        key - the key the asset is stored as
        assetType - the type of the asset
        Returns:
        the loaded asset, or null if there is no asset with the specified key.

      • loadAsset

        public <T> void loadAsset(java.lang.String loc,
                          java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.Class<T> assetType)
        Loads an asset and stores it as the given key. This method is used for relative asset locating, as it uses the root directory.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the asset that is being loaded
        Parameters:
        loc - the relative location of the asset that is being loaded
        key - the key to store the asset as
        assetType - the type of the asset that is being loaded

      • loadAsset

        public <T> void loadAsset(java.net.URL url,
                          java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.Class<T> assetType)
        Loads an asset from a specific URL and stores it as the given key. This method is used for absolute asset locating, so it does not use the root directory at all.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the asset that is being loaded
        Parameters:
        url - the URL location of the asset that is being loaded
        key - the key to store the asset as
        assetType - the type of the asset that is being loaded

        Removes an asset from memory.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the asset to unload
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the asset to unload
        assetType - the type of the asset to unload

        Returns:

      • isJarRoot

        public boolean isJarRoot()
        Returns true if this AssetManager is loading assets relative to the root of a jar file, specified by a given class.
        Returns:
        if this AssetManager is loading assets relative to a jar file's root.

      • loadAssetsInDirectories

        public <T> void loadAssetsInDirectories(java.lang.String loc,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> assetType,
                                        boolean recursive)
        Loads one type of asset in a directory and (optionally) all its subdirectories. The key that each asset is given will be its file name without the extension.

        All files found in the given directory and its subdirectories are expected to be the same asset type.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the asset that is being loaded
        Parameters:
        loc - the relative location of the directory to load
        assetType - the type of the asset that is being loaded
        recursive - whether or not this should load the sub directories as well

      • addAssetLoader

        public <T> void addAssetLoader(AssetLoader<T> loader,
                               java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Adds an AssetLoader to this AssetManager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of assets the AssetLoader loads
        Parameters:
        loader - the AssetLoader to add
        type - the type of assets the AssetLoader loads.

      • removeAssetLoader

        public <T> void removeAssetLoader(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Removes an AssetLoader from this AssetManager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of asset the AssetLoader to remove loads
        Parameters:
        type - the type of assets the AssetLoader to remove loads

      • hasAssetLoader

        public boolean hasAssetLoader(java.lang.Class assetType)
        Checks to see if this AssetManager as an AssetLoader for this type of asset.
        Parameters:
        assetType - the type of asset the asset loader loads.
        Returns:
        true if this AssetManager has an AssetLoader for the given asset type, false otherwise.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the asset requested loader
